django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.pgraster
===============================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.pgraster


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.pgraster.pack
   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.pgraster.unpack
   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.pgraster.chunk
   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.pgraster.from_pgraster
   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.pgraster.to_pgraster


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: pack(structure, data)

   Pack data into hex string with little endian format.


.. py:function:: unpack(structure, data)

   Unpack little endian hexlified binary string into a list.


.. py:function:: chunk(data, index)

   Split a string into two parts at the input index.


.. py:function:: from_pgraster(data)

   Convert a PostGIS HEX String into a dictionary.


.. py:function:: to_pgraster(rast)

   Convert a GDALRaster into PostGIS Raster format.
